In England, in the seven days to 01 October, there were 189,314 new confirmed cases (334.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 September, there were 187,071 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 1% (2,243 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 October is 6,812,848 (12,047.4 cases per 100,000 population).
